00034 BrisaAction::BrisaAction(QString name, BrisaService *service, QObject *parent):
00035         QObject(parent),
00036     name(name),
00037     service(service) {

00040 BrisaAction::BrisaAction(QString name, BrisaService *service, const QMetaMethod &method, QObject *parent):
00041         QObject(parent),
00042     name(name),
00043     service(service),
00044     method(method) {

00047 BrisaAction::BrisaAction(const BrisaAction &action) :
00048                          QObject(action.parent()),
00049                          name(action.getName()),
00050                          service(action.getService()) {
00051     this->method = action.getMethod();
00052     QList<BrisaArgument *> argumentList = action.getArgumentList();
00053     foreach (BrisaArgument *argument, argumentList) {
00054         this->argumentList.append(new BrisaArgument(*argument));
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 BrisaAction::~BrisaAction() {
00060     foreach (BrisaArgument *argument, this->argumentList) {
00061         delete argument;
00062     }
00063 
00064     this->argumentList.clear();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void BrisaAction::addArgument(QString name, QString direction, QString relatedStateVariable) {
00068     BrisaArgument *argumentSwap = new BrisaArgument(name, direction, relatedStateVariable);
00069     this->argumentList.append(argumentSwap);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void BrisaAction::addArgument(BrisaArgument *argumentA) {
00073     this->argumentList.append(argumentA);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void BrisaAction::removeArgument(BrisaArgument* argumentA){
00077         this->argumentList.removeOne(argumentA);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void BrisaAction::addArguments(const QList<BrisaArgument*> arguments) {
00081     for (QList<BrisaArgument*>::const_iterator i = arguments.begin(); i != arguments.end(); ++i) {
00082         this->addArgument(*i);
00083     }
00084 }

00102 BrisaStateVariable* BrisaAction::getStateVariable(const QString &name) const {
00103     if (!this->service) {
00104         qDebug() << this->getName() << " action couldn't find its related Service.";
00105         return 0;
00106     }
00107 
00108     BrisaStateVariable *stateVariable = service->getVariable(name);
00109     if (!stateVariable) {
00110         qDebug() << this->getName() << " action couldn't find the State Variable.";
00111     }
00112 
00113     return stateVariable;
00114 }

00117     return this->argumentList;
00118 }

00120 void BrisaAction::clearArgumentList() {
00121     this->argumentList.clear();
00122 }
00123 
00124 bool BrisaAction::call(BrisaInArgument *inArguments, BrisaOutArgument *&outArguments) {
00125     // Checking IN variables
00126     for (BrisaInArgument::const_iterator i = inArguments->begin(); i != inArguments->end(); ++i) {
00127         BrisaArgument *arg = this->getInArgument(i.key());
00128         if (!arg) {
00129             qDebug() << "Error: action " << this->getName() << " has no IN argument named '" << i.key() << "'.";
00130             return false;
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     // use the run() invocation.
00135     if (this->method.methodIndex() >= 0) { // checking if action has a QMetaMethod specified
00136         bool execResult = this->method.invoke(this->service,
00137                                               Qt::DirectConnection,
00138                                               Q_RETURN_ARG(BrisaOutArgument *, outArguments),
00139                                               Q_ARG(BrisaInArgument *, inArguments),
00140                                               Q_ARG(BrisaAction *, this));
00141         if (!execResult) {
00142             qDebug() << "Error invoking defined action expressed by the service method " << this->method.signature();
00143             return false;
00144         }
00145     } else {
00146         qDebug() << "Error: there is not method to be invoked by this action.";
00147         return false;
00148     }
00149 
00150     // Check OUT variables
00151     for (BrisaOutArgument::const_iterator i = outArguments->begin(); i != outArguments->end(); ++i) {
00152         BrisaArgument *arg = this->getOutArgument(i.key());
00153         if (!arg) {
00154             qDebug() << "Error: action " << this->getName() << " has no OUT expected argument named '" << i.key() << "'.";
00155             return false;
00156         }
00157     }
00158         
00159     return true;
00160 }
00161 
00162 BrisaArgument* BrisaAction::getInArgument(const QString &name) {
00163     return this->getArgument(name, "in");
00164 }
00165 
00166 BrisaArgument* BrisaAction::getOutArgument(const QString &name) {
00167     return this->getArgument(name, "out");
00168 }
00169 
00170 BrisaArgument* BrisaAction::getArgument(const QString &name, const QString &direction) {
00171     foreach (BrisaArgument *argument, this->getArgumentList()) {
00172         if (argument->getAttribute(BrisaArgument::Direction) == direction && argument->getAttribute(BrisaArgument::ArgumentName) == name) {
00173                 return argument;
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177     return 0;
00178 }

00180 void BrisaAction::setMethod(const QMetaMethod &method, BrisaService *service) {
00181     this->method = method;
00182         this->setService(service);
00183 }

00185 QMetaMethod BrisaAction::getMethod() const {
00186     return this->method;
